I am a new user of Heritrix and have been playing with versions 1.10.x
and =
1.12 - running some crawls. 

I see that 1.12 has added the ability to disc=
ard duplicate data. 
I have read the release notes posted here:
http://craw=
ler.archive.org/articles/releasenotes/1_12_0.html

Is there any other docum=
entation on this new feature?
From the notes it looks like Heritrix uses a =
hash to compare pages, is
there also an option to use only the Last-Modifie=
d header for speed
(and less precision)?

If ARC files do not contain the d=
uplicate content how will tools like
WERA and the Java WayBack machine pres=
ent the Web site? 

Anything on these topics that you can point me to - doc=
s, code, etc
would be great.

Thanks,
Mike
